author: openlittermap
title: Gamifying Littercoin
description: OpenLitterMapを使っても、何の問題もなく、魅力的なゲーム体験ができません。大量に採用されるためには、より良いゲーム体験が必要です。

f6_assessments.q0:
It's great to use gaming to apply to an old business model and I believe that will make a big effect. Especially, the old one that this team develops is in Cardano ecosystem, so I think both of them will make a strong effect on Cardano community.
But I'm not sure about how much this new one will impact the Cardano community, and even it merges or not to the old one, I think the team should clear their goals or key metric on developing this new idea. Moreover, these infos also help people assess how much this proposal aligns with the challenge given.
f6_assessments.q1:
They're funded in fund 4 and running their old project, so I think they had a more detailed plan for developing their new one also instead of a short timeline without KPIs or key metrics in this proposal. 
Moreover, it's so hard to understand how they calculate their budget, I guess that it could be based on total work hours. So better is that they should be clear about the budget and their timeline of work. 
Moreover, their referral info and attach clip can help us a lot to visualize what they did and can trust them. Hope that they will provide more info in next proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: It's hard to audit their progress because of lacking a lot of auditability materials. Again, the team needs to provide more detail about the timeline/ roadmap, and at least some key metrics to help Catalyst audit it in the future. Even they have a good explanation about their problem and solution, but lacking of these things can't help a lot.

f6_assessments.q0: Amazing way for adopting new users to the ecosystem by gamification and introducing the awareness of global pollution. The idea of introducing Littercoin without being in an exchange and other platform is a good way to make users slowly learn existing alternatives for global finance! This also bring value for users to be a part of improving the world in many aspects.
f6_assessments.q1: Whilst the evidence of the issue is much solid through their website and incentives for campaigns are to be held in the future, things that need to be addressed are the in-depth information of creating a user-friendly interface for the gamification of the app. Also, the tokenomics and information of the Littercoin would as how it can be used on zero-waste stores will be very much helpful for users to benefit from them.
f6_assessments.q2: Goals of the project are clearly stated, and the solution is understandable. The basic timeline for developing the gamification (1 month) will have to be further detailed, but still it is there. A quite precise budget breakdown is given, but a specific roadmap (ie; Q1 2022, Q2 2022) would be very helpful to improve the productivity of the project. I recommend the proposer to list metrics that will be communicated during the Fund7 governance phase to enable a monitoring by the community of the progress of the project. Based on the given information I grade auditability with a score of 4.

f6_assessments.q0:
Their solution for getting mass adoption is smart, and I believe it can help to solve the problem they put in the proposal. In addition, their plan to make the project to be a flashship project on Cardano can be a potential promise to the development of Cardano ecosystem. 
But I do want to know more detail about their goals and key metrics, because it can help we identify that their way to go is align or not to the requirements of the challenge setting.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team deploy this proposal is also running another on that funded on fund4, so I think we can trust them. 
But for fari assessment that can't be their advantage, so I think this proposal should provide more detail information about their timeline work in their roadmap, and a short explaination about tech they will develop will help. Moreover, the more detail about their game materials and environment will get better assessment from CA instead of only solution explaination.
f6_assessments.q2:
It has timeline of development but lack of KPIs and key metric for auditing the development progress. 
But they have a detaile description of the appear problem they get and trategic solution they will use for solving it. And I think it can clarify for what they have to do in the roadmap.

f6_assessments.q0:
The new way of developing the old project into a game is one of the best ideas that will help it achieve new users a lot. But only idea is not enough, my advice is that proposer should provide more info about how this new idea can really impact to Cardano ecosystem that aligns with the challenge given but not the others. Moreover, giving some key metrics that the team will follow or some KPIs will help people in the community assess it better. 
So, still not enough for me to assess that its impacts this challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
Everything in this proposal is not enough for me to assess the feasibility of the project. The proposal has detail about how their strategy features in the game can solve the problem, it's good but lacks a detailed roadmap and some technology descriptions can't help to assess the feasibility better. 
One more piece of advice from me is that proposer should provide some risks about how they will implement this idea, they still working on the old one and I'm concerned about is it the new one could affect to the old one? 
In addition, their budget breakdown is shown by allocation but I still don't know which period of time that the budget will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer shows us clearly about their problem and perfect solutions for solving it. But lacking detail in the timeline and key metrics against people to clarify and assess the suitability of the project in the future. Even their team proposed another one in fund 4 but I think they should put more info to this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Proposal has a clear problem related to SDG 13 (Climate Action) helps to solve identifying litters through gaming has a huge benefit from for the community.
When implemented in a school setting 
data collection can be a fun for children so eventually they have increased awareness about litter.
f6_assessments.q1: Threre is a clear explaination regarding previous progress of the project. When funded this proposal will provide a new dimention to the litter coin project since fund 4 approval. Therefore proposer has a relevant experience. Besides I would suggest to further information about experience of the team working on the project such as providing linkedin profiles or CV. This project has huge potential I suggest the proposer to make it others dream as well by distributing some of the tasks to others. I suggest working with an expert of blender as it is an opensource platform.
f6_assessments.q2: Although roadmap and milestones needs to be improved tasks of new team members allows to identify how some of the success will look like. Unfortunately it is not clear to identify any challenge or risk from the proposal. Proposer is too optimistic.

solution: 私たちは、地球をきれいにすることをゲームにしています。これは、2022年に開催されるLitterWeekなど、学校向けのデータ収集大会で完結します。
experience: 12年以上の独立したR+Dでopenlittermap.comを開発。MScの後、2015年にLittercoinのアイデアが生まれました。Project CatalystのFund 4で初めて資金調達。
